description: OAuthAuthorizeToken describes an OAuth authorization token

expiresIn.description: ExpiresIn is the seconds from CreationTime before this token expires.

scopes.description: Scopes is an array of the requested scopes.

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: http://releases.k8s.io/HEAD/docs/devel/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

userName.description: UserName is the user name associated with this token

userUID.description: UserUID is the unique UID associated with this token. UserUID and UserName must both match for this token to be valid.

codeChallengeMethod.description: CodeChallengeMethod is the optional code_challenge_method associated with this authorization code, as described in rfc7636

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: http://releases.k8s.io/HEAD/docs/devel/api-conventions.md#resources

codeChallenge.description: CodeChallenge is the optional code_challenge associated with this authorization code, as described in rfc7636

redirectURI.description: RedirectURI is the redirection associated with the token.

clientName.description: ClientName references the client that created this token.
